context_bundle.summary: Chat compaction pipeline - strip tool calls, XML, code blocks from conversations. 3 versions: v1 basic XML strip, v2 filler removal (16%), v3 nuclear compression (52%). Topic segmenter splits into 5 RAM chunks (~10-15k tokens). PhiSHRI=disk, RAM files=working memory.

onboarding.quick_start: Hotkey: Ctrl+Shift+C runs compactor on clipboard. Output: C:\Users\Stryker_LOCAL\Documents\compacted-*.md. Segmenter: C:\MCP-Servers\chat-compactor\segment-context.ps1. RAM files: C:\Users\Stryker_LOCAL\Documents\context-RAM\
common_patterns: Copy conversation -> Ctrl+Shift+C -> compacted file saved
PhiSHRI door points to RAM file for retrieval
10% context tax for full conversation recall
known_errors: Claude app clipboard shows blank - use browser or paste to Notepad first
Closing XML tags in scripts break Claude parser - use char codes
